game_description: Our products use real-time speech recognition as the core interactive method, creating a relaxing and natural environment for you. In this world, we encourage you to explore freely. At the same time, you will meet a group of virtual partners with different skin colors, different personalities, and different images. They will accompany you and help you learn. Here you can see: -Learning content on multiple topics -Gamified learning interactive experience, -A group of learning partners with different personalities will accompany you on your exploration journey -Complete learning, feedback and progress system -This function of wrong questions strengthens the learning effect -Score challenge and hit the excellent learning record of this course! Come join MageVR!
